Title: Litmus
Plot: When a new copy of Doral, a Cylon who had been previously exposed while serving as the Galactica's public-relations officer, sneaks aboard and blows himself up, killing three people, Commander Adama and President Roslin must finally make public the terrifying secret known only to a select few: Cylons now look like humans.
GuestStars: Alonso Oyarzun, Nicki Clyne, Bodi Olmos, Matthew Bennett, Christina Schild, Raahul Singh, Shaw Madson, Nimet Kanji, Biski Gugushe, Morris Chapdelaine, Dominic Zamprogna
